name: UltraSync
0:
”Alexa, turn on hallway light”
”Alexa, set bedrooms to 72 degrees”
”Alexa, turn on bedtime”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control your smart home devices connected to your UltraSync SmartHome Hub.

Enable Alexa voice control of your UltraSync Smart Home.

Requires the UltraSync SmartHome Hub to be installed and operational.

The credentials needed for the UltraSync Alexa Skill linking are enabled in the menu of the iOS/Android UltraSync Mobile App.

***NOTE: The standard USER login credentials do not work for Alexa Skills setup. You must enable Alexa in the UltraSync Mobile App and use the provided Login Credentials.***

Skill provides control of switches, dimmers, thermostats, and UltraSync Automations (Scenes).

Security, Locks, Garage Door Controllers, and Cameras can't be controlled by voice through Alexa.

Please contact your security and home automation dealer for questions or help linking your account.
